ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Radio JOVE MTSU TFD+FSX6S Spectrograph 15-30 MHz Dynamic Spectrogram Plots

RevisionEvent.Note: RadioJOVE: Resource Header Description reformated, One URL corrected for // typo in some files. Metadata submitted by J.M. Weygand on 2021-11-08, reviewed by LFB

ResourceHeader.Description: Dynamic Spectrogram plots from output of the MTSU Terminated Folded Dipole and FSX6S Spectrograph operating from 15-30 MHz. The plots are generated using the Radio-Sky Spectrograph software. The Display Cadence will vary but 8 hours is a reasonable maximum value for the timespan of a single file. Time is presented in Universal Time (UT).
